=== Summary ===

This specification discusses ways to make <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/deja-dup|Déjà Dup]]</nowiki> better.  Déjà Dup is the default backup tool for non-technical users in Ubuntu.

=== Discussion Topics ===

* Feedback from past two cycles
* Plan to move to always-daily backup
* Long term plan
** Move to mandatory-local, with optional sync'd remote
** Add backup browser
* How to get involved
** <nowiki>[[https://live.gnome.org/DejaDup/GettingInvolved/Coding|Coding]]</nowiki> (including distinct <nowiki>[[https://live.gnome.org/DejaDup/GettingInvolved/Tasks|tasks]]</nowiki> that need working on)
** <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net/deja-dup|Translations]]</nowiki>
